Posts.EditableText: If you publish, and then update the code a week later, how will it affect player saves?  If the game has changed dramatically, and objects removed, variables changed, etc..
Posts.HTML: If you publish, and then update the code a week later, how will it affect player saves?  If the game has changed dramatically, and objects removed, variables changed, etc..

Posts.EditableText: Player saves will not be affected at all. The entire game is saved, game code, player state, everything.
Posts.HTML: Player saves will not be affected at all. The entire game is saved, game code, player state, everything.

Posts.EditableText: So does that mean saves will not use the new variables, and continue using the old version?
Posts.HTML: So does that mean saves will not use the new variables, and continue using the old version?
